article_title: In Leawood, Brownback holds firm to conservative policies
article_text:
Lower income tax rates are working to bring jobs, he says

Kansas governor shows no signs of softening positions in upcoming legislative session

article_metadata.title: In Leawood, Brownback holds firm to conservative policies | The Kansas City Star

og.description: Gov. Sam Brownback is not only the state’s elected leader, he’s the leader of the state’s Republican agenda.
